vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τέρτυλλος, -ου, ό
Tertullus: Act.2:1-2.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.24.1
§ Tertullus, "third"
Tertullus, (Proper name), an attorney, Acts 24:1f.*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
帖士羅 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "三倍堅強"
一個羅馬演說家 #徒 24:1-2|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
帖士罗 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "三倍坚强"
一个罗马演说家 #徒 24:1-2|
